name: nitpicking

relating to the act of nitpicking or to a nitpicker (= someone who gives too much attention to details that are not important): a nitpicking attitude Making maps is a very precise and nitpicking operation.
More examplesFewer examplesI make it a policy to avoid nitpicking arguments.One last nitpicking detail: this is a lengthy study and could have been shorter in certain places.They are tired of what they regard as nitpicking complaints for minor violations.
